translated: Nevertheless, one should understand that attachment to cyclic existence is definitely due to the causes that have been taught.

original: de bas na brdzun gyi bdag nyid rtog pa'i bag chags kyis bcings pas sdug bsngal 'byung bar byed do //
analyzed: de bas na brdzun gyi bdag nyid rtog pa'i bag chags kyis bcings pas sdug bsngal 'byung bar byed do //
translated: Therefore, suffering arises due to the bondage of the latent impressions of the imagination of a self that is false.

original: gzhan du na gnyis po dag ni brdzun nyid yin pas /
analyzed: gzhan du na gnyis po dag ni brdzun nyid yin pas /
translated: Otherwise, since both are false,

original: mkhas pa rnams gang gi don du grol ba la 'bad par byed /
analyzed: mkhas pa rnams gang gi don du grol ba la 'bad par byed /
translated: for the sake of what do the wise strive for liberation?

original: de lta na yang brdzun du brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta na yang brdzun du brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: In that case, since it is false,

original: brdzun gyi byed pa spangs pa'i don nyid yin no //
analyzed: brdzun gyi byed pa spangs pa'i don nyid yin no //
translated: the meaning of abandoning the activity of the false is itself liberation.

original: brdzun gyi byed pa gang gis 'ching ba'i byed pa las 'di ltar sdug bsngal 'byung bar byed do //
analyzed: brdzun gyi byed pa gang gis 'ching ba'i byed pa las 'di ltar sdug bsngal 'byung bar byed do //
translated: By the activity of the false, the activity of bondage arises, and thus suffering arises.

original: de ni ji lta ji ltar bag chags kyi byed pa de dang de bsal bar byas pa 'di nyid grol ba'o //
analyzed: de ni ji lta ji ltar bag chags kyi byed pa de dang de bsal bar byas pa 'di nyid grol ba'o //
translated: Just as that is removed, the latent impressions are removed, and this itself is liberation.

original: gzhan du na grol ba zhes bya ba gzhan dngos po ci yang med par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan du na grol ba zhes bya ba gzhan dngos po ci yang med par rig par bya ste /
translated: Otherwise, one should understand that there is nothing else whatsoever that is called ‚Äúliberation.‚Äù

original: 'di ltar yul gyi snang ba'i rnam pa de ltar bcom ldan 'das chos ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar yul gyi snang ba'i rnam pa de ltar bcom ldan 'das chos ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, the Blessed One teaches the truth by the appearance of the object.

original: gzhan yang 'di ltar yul gyi snang ba'i rnam pas de kho na nyid snang bar byed de /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'di ltar yul gyi snang ba'i rnam pas de kho na nyid snang bar byed de /
translated: Moreover, the reality is illuminated by the appearance of the object.

original: de'i phyir thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid bstan pa'i 'di ni de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid bstan pa'i 'di ni de kho na nyid do //
translated: Therefore, this teaching of the nature of means and insight is reality.

original: 'di ci zhig bsal ba gnyis gcig gi bdag nyid du ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di ci zhig bsal ba gnyis gcig gi bdag nyid du ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: How can the two, which are mutually exclusive, be of the same nature?

original: 'di ltar grib ma dang snang ba dag kyang gcig tu brjod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ltar grib ma dang snang ba dag kyang gcig tu brjod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: In that case, even shade and light would be the same.

original: ma yin te rgyu la 'bras bu nye bar gdags pa byas nas /
analyzed: ma yin te rgyu la 'bras bu nye bar gdags pa byas nas /
translated: No, for the effect is figuratively designated as the cause.

original: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid la de kho na nyid ces brjod de /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid la de kho na nyid ces brjod de /
translated: The nature of means and insight is called reality.

original: dper na yul grang ba'i chu la rkang pa'i nad ces bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na yul grang ba'i chu la rkang pa'i nad ces bya ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, the disease of the feet is called the disease of the country, where one is afflicted by cold water.

original: de bas na thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba las dga' ba la sogs pa'i rim pas /
analyzed: de bas na thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba las dga' ba la sogs pa'i rim pas /
translated: Therefore, from the union of means and insight, there is the sequence of joy, etc.

original: rang bzhin gyi dga' ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes 'byung bar 'gyur bas /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi dga' ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes 'byung bar 'gyur bas /
translated: because the pristine wisdom that is the essence of natural bliss will arise.

original: thabs dang shes rab dag gi rgyu la de kho na nyid kyi ngo bor bshad do //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab dag gi rgyu la de kho na nyid kyi ngo bor bshad do //
translated: Therefore, the cause of method and wisdom is explained as the essence of thatness.

original: de bas na bsal ba med de /
analyzed: de bas na bsal ba med de /
translated: Therefore, there is no removal.

original: de lta bu'i rgyu len pa las ye shes kyi bye brag gzhan nyid 'byung ste /
analyzed: de lta bu'i rgyu len pa las ye shes kyi bye brag gzhan nyid 'byung ste /
translated: From taking up such a cause, another kind of pristine wisdom arises.

original: dper na bur ma dang dong gra zos pa las /
analyzed: dper na bur ma dang dong gra zos pa las /
translated: For example, from eating sugarcane and ginger,

original: 'bras bu rims la phan pa'i mtshan nyid gzhan nyid 'byung ngo zhes bya ba 'dir 'gyur ro //üîΩthabs dang shes rab bdag nyid kyi bdag nyid las gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin gyi rang rig pa'i bdag nyid @315a * //
analyzed: 'bras bu rims la phan pa'i mtshan nyid gzhan nyid 'byung ngo zhes bya ba 'dir 'gyur ro // thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid kyi bdag nyid las gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin gyi rang rig pa'i bdag nyid @315a * //
translated: another kind of fruit arises that has the characteristic of being beneficial for a fever.üîΩHow does the pristine wisdom that is the nature of method and wisdom, the nature of nondual self-awareness,

original: kyi ye shes ji ltar 'byung /
analyzed: kyi ye shes ji ltar 'byung /
translated: arise from a self that is the nature of nonduality?

original: rgyu gnyis pa dang bcas pa'i 'bras bu gnyis su med pa ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: rgyu gnyis pa dang bcas pa'i 'bras bu gnyis su med pa ni mi rigs so //
translated: It is illogical that the result of a cause that is accompanied by a second cause is nondual.

original: de bas na dmigs pa dang bcas pa yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na dmigs pa dang bcas pa yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, because it is accompanied by an object,

original: thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyu las dmigs pa med pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i rang rig pa ji ltar 'byung /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyu las dmigs pa med pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i rang rig pa ji ltar 'byung /
translated: How could reflexive awareness that is non-dual, non-conceptual, and non-apprehending arise from the causes of method and wisdom?

original: rgyu dang mthun pa nyid kyi tshul du 'bras bu 'byung ste /
analyzed: rgyu dang mthun pa nyid kyi tshul du 'bras bu 'byung ste /
translated: An effect arises in a manner that accords with its cause.

original: dper na skud pa nag po las byas pa'i snam bu nag por 'gyur ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na skud pa nag po las byas pa'i snam bu nag por 'gyur ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, a cloth made from black thread is black.

original: gzhan du na rjes su mthun pa ji lta bar len par byed par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan du na rjes su mthun pa ji lta bar len par byed par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Otherwise, it would not be a concordant effect.

original: de lta ma yin te rgyu'ang gzhan yin la 'bras bu'ang gzhan yin te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin te rgyu'ang gzhan yin la 'bras bu'ang gzhan yin te /
translated: That is not so, because the cause is different and the effect is different.

original: rgyu nyid 'bras bur mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu nyid 'bras bur mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The cause itself does not become the effect.

original: de'i phyir ngo bo nyid tha dad pa la ji lta bar rjes su mthun par brtag pa 'dis ci zhig bya /
analyzed: de'i phyir ngo bo nyid tha dad pa la ji lta bar rjes su mthun par brtag pa 'dis ci zhig bya /
translated: Therefore, what is the point of this analysis of how a concordant effect arises from a cause that is different from it?

original: shing pi pa la'i sa bon phra mo la de lta bu'i yal ga la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi shing mi 'byung bas /
analyzed: shing pi pa la'i sa bon phra mo la de lta bu'i yal ga la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi shing mi 'byung bas /
translated: A tiny seed of a pippala tree does not give rise to a tree that has branches and so on.

original: de bzhin mthun pa nyid du 'gyur ba ci zhig yin /
analyzed: de bzhin mthun pa nyid du 'gyur ba ci zhig yin /
translated: So how could the effect be concordant with the cause?

original: yang na thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid ces bya ba 'di gsal bar byed pa tsam nyid yin te /
analyzed: yang na thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid ces bya ba 'di gsal bar byed pa tsam nyid yin te /
translated: Or else, this so-called identity of method and wisdom is merely the illumination.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i bdag nyid ni bde bzhin pa'i ye shes nyid yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i bdag nyid ni bde bzhin pa'i ye shes nyid yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: The identity of the connate is to be known as the exalted wisdom of bliss itself.

original: thabs dang shes rab dag ni mngon par gsal bar byed pa nyid tsam mo //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab dag ni mngon par gsal bar byed pa nyid tsam mo //
translated: Method and wisdom are merely the illumination.

original: de lta na bag chags kyi sgrib pa zad par byas pas rang nyid de kho na nyid rang rig pa rtogs par byed de /
analyzed: de lta na bag chags kyi sgrib pa zad par byas pas rang nyid de kho na nyid rang rig pa rtogs par byed de /
translated: Thus, by exhausting the obscurations of habitual tendencies, one realizes the very self-awareness of thatness.

original: mar me'i sbyor bas bum pa bzhin no //
analyzed: mar me'i sbyor bas bum pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like a vase by the application of a lamp.

original: yang na thabs dang shes rab ces bya ba'i sgra 'dis srid pa dang / mi srid pa'i 'gro ba mtha' dag gi dngos po brjod pa ste /
analyzed: yang na thabs dang shes rab ces bya ba'i sgra 'dis srid pa dang / mi srid pa'i 'gro ba mtha' dag gi dngos po brjod pa ste /
translated: Or else, the words method and wisdom express all things of the world of possibility and the world of impossibility.

original: gang yang 'di ltar srid pa dang mi srid pa la sogs pa'i 'gro ba'i dngos po ni de kho na'i rang bzhin nyid las gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: gang yang 'di ltar srid pa dang mi srid pa la sogs pa'i 'gro ba'i dngos po ni de kho na'i rang bzhin nyid las gzhan ma yin no //
translated: And in this way, the things of the world of possibility and the world of impossibility are nothing other than the nature of thatness itself.

original: de lta na yang srid pa dang mi srid pa dag ni gcig gis gcig bsal ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas /
analyzed: de lta na yang srid pa dang mi srid pa dag ni gcig gis gcig bsal ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas /
translated: Thus, existence and nonexistence have the characteristic of mutually excluding each other.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid las de kho na nyid ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid las de kho na nyid ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: How could reality be their nature?

original: de ni bzang po ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni bzang po ma yin no //
translated: That is not good.

original: 'dis ni srid pa dang mi srid pa la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi dmigs pa rnam pa gnyis ka yang bsal bar rig par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dis ni srid pa dang mi srid pa la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi dmigs pa rnam pa gnyis ka yang bsal bar rig par bya ste /
translated: By this, both of the two kinds of objects that have the nature of existence and nonexistence, etc., should be understood as excluded.

original: 'di ltar dngos po'i ngo bo nyid mngon par grub na /
analyzed: 'di ltar dngos po'i ngo bo nyid mngon par grub na /
translated: Thus, if the nature of an entity is established,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid sel bar byed de /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid sel bar byed de /
translated: the nature of a nonentity is excluded.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dag gis kyang @315b dngos po 'gog go //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dag gis kyang @315b dngos po 'gog go //
translated: And by the natures of nonentities, entities are excluded.

original: ji ltar so sor nges pa'i bdag nyid kyi dngos pos ngo bo nyid gnyis ka'ang sel bar byed do //
analyzed: ji ltar so sor nges pa'i bdag nyid kyi dngos pos ngo bo nyid gnyis ka'ang sel bar byed do //
translated: And by the nature of an entity that is individually distinct, both natures are excluded.

original: de lta bas na dngos po dang dngos po med pa la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyang /
analyzed: de lta bas na dngos po dang dngos po med pa la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyang /
translated: Thus, existence and nonexistence, etc.,

original: de dag gis de kho na dmigs pa med de /
analyzed: de dag gis de kho na dmigs pa med de /
translated: do not have those as their objects,

original: gnyis ka la yang nyes pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis ka la yang nyes pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is a fault in both cases.

original: 'di ci zhig rig pa'i bdag nyid kyang de kho na nyid la med pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'di ci zhig rig pa'i bdag nyid kyang de kho na nyid la med pa ma yin nam /
translated: And how could it be that the nature of awareness does not exist in reality?

original: 'di ltar ma nges pa'i bdag nyid kyi rig pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di ltar ma nges pa'i bdag nyid kyi rig pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur /
translated: Thus, how could awareness have an uncertain nature?

original: dngos po yang 'khrul pa ste /
analyzed: dngos po yang 'khrul pa ste /
translated: An entity is also mistaken,

original: 'di ltar tho yor dang skyes pa'i gzugs dag ma nges pa las gang rig pa de 'khrul pa nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ltar tho yor dang skyes pa'i gzugs dag ma nges pa las gang rig pa de 'khrul pa nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: because in that way, awareness of a post and a human form from an uncertain perspective is just a mistake.

original: de'i phyir nges pa'i dngos pos gang rig pa de ni de kho na nyid ji lta bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir nges pa'i dngos pos gang rig pa de ni de kho na nyid ji lta bar 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, how could awareness of an entity that is certain be reality, just as it is?

original: bum pa'i lto ba dang mgrin pa'i gzugs dag nges pa las bum pa rig go zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bum pa'i lto ba dang mgrin pa'i gzugs dag nges pa las bum pa rig go zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It would be like saying that awareness of a pot is from the form of the pot‚Äôs belly and neck.

original: de bas na dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i bdag nyid nges pa las de kho na nyid rig pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i bdag nyid nges pa las de kho na nyid rig pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, awareness of reality would be from the certainty of the nature of an entity and nonentity.

original: 'di ltar de rig pa las 'khor ba las yongs su thar pa ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di ltar de rig pa las 'khor ba las yongs su thar pa ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: In that case, how could there be complete freedom from samsara through awareness of that?

original: gal te ma rig na yang de kho na nyid du 'gyur bas srid pa 'di 'gog go //
analyzed: gal te ma rig na yang de kho na nyid du 'gyur bas srid pa 'di 'gog go //
translated: If it is uncertain, then it would be reality, and this existence would cease.

original: thams cad kyis kyang de thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: thams cad kyis kyang de thob par 'gyur te /
translated: And everyone will attain that.

original: 'di ltar 'bad pa med pa nyid du 'khor ba ba srid pa las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'bad pa med pa nyid du 'khor ba ba srid pa las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, without any effort, one will attain the transcendence of suffering beyond cyclic existence.

original: 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
translated: This is what should be said:

original: kho bo ni de kho na nyid med par smra ba ma yin te /
analyzed: kho bo ni de kho na nyid med par smra ba ma yin te /
translated: I do not advocate that reality does not exist.

original: 'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba'i bdag nyid nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba'i bdag nyid nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba /
translated: Thus, in order to realize the nature of reality just as it is, free from all faults,

original: so sor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'bad par byed de /
analyzed: so sor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'bad par byed de /
translated: I strive.

original: gang dang gang du nyes pa yod pa'i phyogs de dang de kho na nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang dang gang du nyes pa yod pa'i phyogs de dang de kho na nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Wherever there is a fault, that is not reality.

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag kyang nyes skyon gyi 'byung gnas yin na /
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag kyang nyes skyon gyi 'byung gnas yin na /
translated: If things and nonthings are the sources of faults,

original: de'i bdag nyid kyi de kho na nyid du ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyi de kho na nyid du ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: how could they be reality, which is their opposite?

original: de bas na phyogs thams cad mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshad ma'i stobs kyis 'ongs pa'i ngo bo nyid 'di la ci zhig brtsad /
analyzed: de bas na phyogs thams cad mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshad ma'i stobs kyis 'ongs pa'i ngo bo nyid 'di la ci zhig brtsad /
translated: Therefore, what is the point of debating this reality that has come about through the power of valid knowledge, whose nature is the nonapprehension of any position?

original: gzhan yang ma nges pa'i dngos pos rig pa dang / rig pa ma yin pa nyid du ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: gzhan yang ma nges pa'i dngos pos rig pa dang / rig pa ma yin pa nyid du ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: Moreover, how could there be awareness or non-awareness due to an indeterminate entity?

original: long ba dang lkugs pa la sogs pa rnams kyi sa mngar ba la sogs pa bro ba nyams su myong ba bzhin no //
analyzed: long ba dang lkugs pa la sogs pa rnams kyi sa mngar ba la sogs pa bro ba nyams su myong ba bzhin no //
translated: It is like the experience of sweet and so on by the blind and the mute and so on.

original: de la 'di ltar ngo bo nyid med pa ma nges pa las nyams su myong ba med pa nyid du ji ltar 'gyur /üîΩde la long ba la sngon po dang dkar po la sogs @316a * //
analyzed: de la 'di ltar ngo bo nyid med pa ma nges pa las nyams su myong ba med pa nyid du ji ltar 'gyur / de la long ba la sngon po dang dkar po la sogs @316a * //
translated: In that case, how could there be non-experience due to the non-ascertainment of essencelessness?

original: pa'i ngo bo nyid du de la ma nges la /
analyzed: pa'i ngo bo nyid du de la ma nges la /
translated: In that case, the blind do not ascertain blue, white, and so on as the essence of form.

original: lkugs pa dag la yang 'di lta bu zhig ces brjod pa med do //
analyzed: lkugs pa dag la yang 'di lta bu zhig ces brjod pa med do //
translated: And the mute do not have the expression ‚Äúsuch and such.‚Äù

original: de bas na ma nges pa zhes bya ba de kho na nyid kyi dngos po ma yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na ma nges pa zhes bya ba de kho na nyid kyi dngos po ma yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, that which is called ‚Äúnon-ascertainment‚Äù is not a real entity of reality.

original: rnam pa thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i bdag nyid de /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i bdag nyid de /
translated: Therefore, the nature of all aspects is essenceless.

original: rig pa tsam spang bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: rig pa tsam spang bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not abandon mere awareness.

original: gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa nyid rnam pa dang bral ba'i de kho na nyid kyi ye shes su de brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa nyid rnam pa dang bral ba'i de kho na nyid kyi ye shes su de brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, the absence of intrinsic reality in all aspects is described as the pristine wisdom of reality free from aspects.

original: de la yang rnam pa 'di ltar snang ba de'i ngo bo nyid ji lta bu zhig yin /
analyzed: de la yang rnam pa 'di ltar snang ba de'i ngo bo nyid ji lta bu zhig yin /
translated: In that regard, what is the intrinsic reality of these appearances?

original: re zhig phyi rol gyi don ni gcig dang du ma'i ngo bo nyid kyis med pa nyid du rig par bya ste ;
analyzed: re zhig phyi rol gyi don ni gcig dang du ma'i ngo bo nyid kyis med pa nyid du rig par bya ste ;
translated: First, external objects should be understood as nonexistent by way of the intrinsic reality of singularity and multiplicity.

original: de bas na rnam pa 'di dag ji lta bu zhig yin pa brjod par mi nus te 'di dag yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na rnam pa 'di dag ji lta bu zhig yin pa brjod par mi nus te 'di dag yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is impossible to say what these aspects are like, and they are called unreal.

original: de ltar na re zhig rnam pa'i shes pa nyid kyis rnam pa brdzun du brjod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na re zhig rnam pa'i shes pa nyid kyis rnam pa brdzun du brjod pa ma yin te /
translated: Thus, first, consciousness itself is not described as false by way of the aspects,

original: de yang de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas so //
analyzed: de yang de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas so //
translated: because those are its intrinsic reality.

original: sngon po'i shes pa nyid kyis sngon po brdzun par rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sngon po'i shes pa nyid kyis sngon po brdzun par rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: The consciousness of blue itself does not realize blue to be false.

original: de bzhin du bden pa gang ci yang rung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du bden pa gang ci yang rung ste /
translated: Likewise, whatever is true

original: rig pa nyid kyis bden par mi byed do //
analyzed: rig pa nyid kyis bden par mi byed do //
translated: is not made true by way of awareness.

original: yang bden pa gzhan gyi rnam par brdzun par rtogs pa nus pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: yang bden pa gzhan gyi rnam par brdzun par rtogs pa nus pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, it is not possible for a consciousness to realize the falsity of another object of knowledge.

original: re zhig gzhan rnam pa dang bral ba'i shes pas rmi lam lta bu'ang rtogs par mi byed do //
analyzed: re zhig gzhan rnam pa dang bral ba'i shes pas rmi lam lta bu'ang rtogs par mi byed do //
translated: A consciousness that is devoid of aspects does not realize the falsity of an object of knowledge, just as in a dream.

original: de bas na rnam pa dang bral ba des rnam pa brdzun du ji ltar rtogs /
analyzed: de bas na rnam pa dang bral ba des rnam pa brdzun du ji ltar rtogs /
translated: Therefore, how could a consciousness that is devoid of aspects realize the falsity of an aspect?

original: gzhan yang shes pa gzhan gyis shes pa gzhan gyi khyad par brdzun par byed par nus pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang shes pa gzhan gyis shes pa gzhan gyi khyad par brdzun par byed par nus pa yang ma yin te /
